meanings.definition: A representation of a facial expression using punctuation marks, letters, and numbers, typically used in electronic communication to convey emotion.
meanings.sent1: She always adds emoticons to her messages to show how she feels.
meanings.sent2: I sent a smiley emoticon to express my happiness.
meanings.sent3: The emoticons on his screen seemed to be having a little party.
meanings.sent4: Her email was like a storybook, with emoticons playing the characters.
meanings.sent5: The emoticons danced across the screen, bringing the text to life.

meanings.definition: A small digital image or icon used to express an idea or emotion in electronic communication.
meanings.sent1: He used cute emoticons in his chat to make it more fun.
meanings.sent2: The emoticons in the chatroom were so colorful and expressive.
meanings.sent3: The emoticons in the group chat seemed to be gossiping about something.
meanings.sent4: Her phone was filled with emoticons, like a digital art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The emoticons popped up on the screen, adding a touch of humor to the conversation.
